Subbed Projects.Show Name: Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex

Bad Comments: Clear typesetting, even had pop-outs to translate on-screen items such as labels.  Intro song translation was off however.

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex 2nd GIG

Good Comments: Good quality, nice bits of info
The subs is made for GITS subbing, and GITS has some of the most complexed dialogues (no pun intended).
Final version is better than the retail discs.  More information and a better translation.
Bad Comments: The characters were a good size and had good translations
Vocabulary used in translation is spot-on most of the time...
Frequent mistranslation, even as bad as translating spoken english into something else to fit previous errors
